roleset.name: avoid, shun
roleset.note: ESCHEW-V NOTES: Although the etymology of eschew is unclear, it has nothing to do withchewing. (from eschew.01-v)

example.name: pretty easy, really
example.text: Since its founding in 1818, Brooks Brothers, the standard-bearer of the Ivy League look, has eschewed flashy sales promotions and fashion trends -- the rules that most retailers live by.
example.arg: Brooks Brothers, the standard-bearer of the Ivy League look,
flashy sales promotions and fashion trends -- the rules that most retailers live by
